T02D2147:231a-1: a'ar+ya n'i l'a mba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni ru tra bi ti tantra britti n'a ma /
T02D2147:231a-3: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can
T02D2147:231a-4: drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud gyi 'grel
T02D2147:231a-5: pa / bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2147:231a-6: gang zhig nyon mongs dug las sgrol mdzad pa //
T02D2147:231a-7: don dam dbyer med khro chags skur snang ba //
T02D2147:231a-8: gdug pa'i dug rnams 'joms par mdzad pa yi //
T02D2147:231a-9: thugs rje can la rab tu gus btud de //
T02D2147:231a-10: dug zan chu dang 'o ma dbye ba yi //
T02D2147:231a-11: bla ma'i rim gyis rgyud 'dir phan phyir brtsam //
T02D2147:231a-12: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
T02D2147:231a-13: mi 'gyur dbyer med rtags kyis mtshan //
T02D2147:231a-14: drag po rnam gsum nyon mongs 'joms //
T02D2147:231a-15: nyon mongs shes bya las 'phags pa'i //
T02D2147:231a-16: brjod med rtog bral sku don bshad //
T02D2147:231a-17: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
T02D2147:231a-18: bcom ldan 'das bdud rnam par 'joms pa bdud kyi sde dang /
T02D2147:231a-19: lhan cig tu 'og min gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
T02D2147:231a-20: pho brang na thabs cig tu bzhugs te zhes bya
T02D2147:231a-21: ba ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu sems bskyed
T02D2147:231a-22: nas bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyis lung ston
T02D2147:231a-24: gdul bya gdul bar mdzad pa ni //
T02D2147:231a-25: bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mdzad de //
T02D2147:231b-0: 'od bye ba dpag tu med pas khyab par mdzad nas ngan @231b song gsum sbyong bar mdzad de /
T02D2147:231b-3: ldeg pa ston pa mdzad nas /
T02D2147:231b-4: rdo rje gdan byang chub kyi snying po de nyid du bzhugs so //
T02D2147:231b-5: de nas bdud dga' rab dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas
T02D2147:231b-6: pa ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus de nyid du lhags
T02D2147:231b-7: nas bar du gcong bar bya ba'i phyir tshig 'di
T02D2147:231b-8: smras te // sems can yangs su smin ma byas //
T02D2147:231b-9: pha rol phyin drug rdzogs ma byas //
T02D2147:231b-10: spyod pa de gnyis rdzogs byas nas //
T02D2147:231b-11: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te //
T02D2147:231b-12: de med phyir na mi rigs so //
T02D2147:231b-14: de'i don ni sems can yongs su smin par ma
T02D2147:231b-15: byas pa dang bskal pa dpag tu med par sems
T02D2147:231b-16: sbyangs shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad
T02D2147:231b-17: dgos pa las khyod kyis de ma spyad pas sangs
T02D2147:231b-18: rgyas par mi rigs so zhes smras /
T02D2147:231b-19: bdud de'i bsam pa phyin ci log bzlog par bya
T02D2147:231b-20: ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g-yas pas la
T02D2147:231b-21: brdabs pas sa gzhi thams cad g-yos 'khrugs nas /
T02D2147:231b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun de nyid du sa'i lha mo gser btso ma lta bu 'thon te /
T02D2147:231b-23: 'thon pa tsam gyis bdud bred bzhin du 'dug par 'gyur ro //
T02D2147:231b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo de
T02D2147:231b-25: la bsgo ba mdzad nas nge sa'i steng nas rdul
T02D2147:231b-27: sangs rgyas par rigs so zhes smras pas bdud 'khrugs nas nam mkha' la song ngo //
T02D2147:231b-28: de nas bdud de gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu'i bdud dang /
T02D2147:231b-29: sa 'og na gnas pa'i klu dang /
T02D2147:231b-30: sa steng na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin lag na rdo
T02D2147:231b-31: rje la sogs pa bdud kyi 'khor thams cad bsdus
T02D2147:231b-32: par gyur to / de nas bcom ldan 'das la
T02D2147:231b-33: bdud 'khor dang bcas pas mtshon rnam pa du ma
T02D2147:231b-34: par gyur to / dang / 'brug dang thog dang /
T02D2147:231b-35: lcags kyi ser ba drag po dbab pa dang /
T02D2147:231b-36: gcan gzan gdug pa bzhin khros pa rbad pa dang /
T02D2147:231b-37: ri dang brag thogs pa med par 'phangs pa de thams cad zhi bar mdzad de //
T02D2147:231b-38: gang gas kyang mthang bar ma gyur to //
T02D2147:231b-39: de nas nam mkha'i dkyil de nyid du dus gsum
T02D2147:231b-40: gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer
T02D2147:231b-41: gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku phyag na rdo rje'i
T02D2147:231b-42: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so //
T02D2147:231b-43: zhugs pa'i de ma thag tu g-yo ba dang 'gul ba dang//
T02D2147:232a-0: @232a * // ldeg pa la sogs pa byung ste /
T02D2147:232a-1: bdud de rnams ci byung snyam pa'i bsam pas phyogs
T02D2147:232a-2: su blta ba ni bred cing sdug bsngal ba'i bsam
T02D2147:232a-3: pas so // de nas nam mkha' la bltas te /
T02D2147:232a-4: mthong bar gyur nas snying 'gas pa'i tshul gyis sa la 'gyel bar gyur te /
T02D2147:232a-5: sa dang po'i bsam pa dang ldan par gyur to //
T02D2147:232a-6: de nas sprul pa'i phyag na rdo rje byang chub
T02D2147:232a-7: sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa 'jig
T02D2147:232a-8: rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'thon te /
T02D2147:232a-9: bcom ldan 'das de la bskor ba byas nas /
T02D2147:232a-10: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje'i phyag gis /
T02D2147:232a-11: bdud de rnams la reg ma thag tu dran pa rnyed par gyur te /
T02D2147:232a-12: snying rje'i bsam pa rgyud la skyes nas nam mkha'i khro bo chen po yang mthong bar gyur te /
T02D2147:232a-13: phyag na rdo rje la myur ba'i tshul gyis skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshig brjod pa ni /
T02D2147:232a-14: gtso bo bdag cag rnams la bskyab tu gsol /
T02D2147:232a-15: 'jigs pa chen po 'di las bskyab tu gsol zhes smras pa dang /
T02D2147:232a-16: phyag na rdo rjes de nyid la song zhes pa'i len brjod nas skyabs su song ngo //
T02D2147:232a-17: de nas dus de'i dus su zhu ba phyag na rdo rje bdag gis thos /
T02D2147:232a-19: 'o na gang las thos she na /
T02D2147:232a-20: bcom ldan 'das bdud rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag na
T02D2147:232a-21: rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i
T02D2147:232a-24: 'dod pa khams kyi rtse mo gzugs kyi khams kyi tha ma ste /
T02D2147:232a-25: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas su'o //
T02D2147:232a-28: sa 'og gi gdug pa can rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
T02D2147:232a-29: 'o na rgyu de rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs she na /
T02D2147:232a-30: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la sogs pa
T02D2147:232a-31: gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa ji
T02D2147:232a-32: snyed cig bzhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub tu sems
T02D2147:232a-33: skyed par mdzad pa'i rjes la /
T02D2147:232a-34: ma 'ongs par lung ston par mdzad de /
T02D2147:232a-35: khyod bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba mi mdzad du 'byung ngo zhes lung bstan nas /
T02D2147:232a-36: gdug pa can rnam pa 'di gsum thul cig ces gnang ba sbyin pas na /
T02D2147:232a-37: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dang bcas pa pham par byed pa dang /
T02D2147:232b-0: bdud kyi sde dpon dang bcas pa @232b pa ma bar byed pa /
T02D2147:232b-1: klu'i sde dpon dang bcas pa pham par byed pa'i
T02D2147:232b-2: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i phyag na
T02D2147:232b-3: rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o
T02D2147:232b-4: // de'i phyir dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas 'das pas byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D2147:232b-5: da ltar byung bas byin gyis rlob pa /
T02D2147:232b-6: ma 'ongs pas byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba 'di
T02D2147:232b-7: lag na rdo rjes zung shig ces bka' stsal pa'o
T02D2147:232b-8: // de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul nas /
T02D2147:232b-9: phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba zhes bya ba ni gus pa'i tshul gyis bstod /
T02D2147:232b-10: gnod sbyin stong phrag bye ba dpag tu med pa'i tshigs kyis yongs su bskor ba ;
T02D2147:232b-12: 'tsham pa zhes bya ba ni mche ba ni nyon mongs pa can dang /
T02D2147:232b-13: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa gcod pa ste /
T02D2147:232b-15: yang na gdug pa can la'o //
T02D2147:232b-16: de'i don ni sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis rtsad nas
T02D2147:232b-17: gtso cing thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la spyod pa'o
T02D2147:232b-18: // mig me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2147:232b-21: yang na gdug pa can sreg par byed pa'i spyan no //
T02D2147:232b-22: de'i don ni ma rig pa 'joms pa'o //
T02D2147:232b-23: shes rab me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba ni ye shes chen po rang 'bar ba'o //
T02D2147:232b-25: me lce ni smin par byed pa ste /
T02D2147:232b-27: yang na 'jigs pa'i nga ro ni h'um ngo //
T02D2147:232b-28: sgra ni phyir bsgrogs pa ste /
T02D2147:232b-30: de ni me lce bzhin 'bar zhing gdug pa can sreg par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2147:232b-31: de'i don ni dbugs ni rgyun mi 'chad pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2147:232b-32: me ltar 'bar ba ni gsal ba'o ;
T02D2147:232b-33: /'jigs pa ni 'jigs pa thams cad do //
T02D2147:232b-34: nga ro can ni dbugs 'byin pa ste /
T02D2147:232b-35: 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par byed pa'o //
T02D2147:232b-36: de bas na 'dod chags kyi dbugs 'byin pa la de skad bya'o //
T02D2147:232b-38: smin ma khro gnyer bsdus pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2147:232b-39: sku gsum gyis 'gro ba'i don byed pa dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2147:232b-40: rnam par dag cing sku gsum gyi 'bras bu dang ldan pa la bstod pa'o //
T02D2147:232b-41: padma dang chu lhas lag pa dang dpung pa brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni sprul dkar pos so //
T02D2147:232b-42: nor rgyas dang dung skyong gis dbu la brgyan zhes bya ba ni cod pan byas pa'o //
T02D2147:233a-1: 'bar ba cod pan thogs pa ni sprul de bzhi
T02D2147:233a-2: la rna ba'i steng na rin po che 'bar ba'i
T02D2147:233a-4: de yang con pan byas pa'i nor bu ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'bar ba'o //
T02D2147:233a-5: gzhan gyi nor bu ni mthon ka dang /
T02D2147:233a-8: klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas snyan
T02D2147:233a-9: cha byas pa zhes bya ba ni sprul dmar po
T02D2147:233a-10: gnyis so // 'bar pa ni sbyi gtsug na padma r'a ga 'bar ba'o //
T02D2147:233a-11: rkang pas sprul gdug pa 'bar ba mnan zhing za ba /
T02D2147:233a-12: klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs ska rags su bcings shing /
T02D2147:233a-13: klu nag po se ral khar thogs pa zhes bya ba ni stobs kyi rgyu dang ;
T02D2147:233a-14: / rigs ldan gnyis nag po khar ba bcug nas se ral khar drangs pa ste //
T02D2147:233a-15: kha nas dug nag po 'phro ba sbyi bo na aindra n'i la'i nor bu ljang nag 'bar ba'o //
T02D2147:233a-16: des ni zhe sdang can 'dul bar byed pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D2147:233a-17: bzhin rgyas pa ya sos ma mchu mnan pa zhes
T02D2147:233a-18: bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'am
T02D2147:233a-19: / dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa ste /
T02D2147:233a-20: rgyas pas ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin du rgyas pa'o //
T02D2147:233a-21: de'i don ni 'dod chags can 'dul bar byed pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2147:233a-22: gshin rje'i cha byad ni sku che ba dang /
T02D2147:233a-24: de dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das de ni phyin
T02D2147:233a-25: ci log la zhugs pa la khros shing ljags 'khyug
T02D2147:233a-26: pa dang / gsus pa 'khyil zhing sprul za bar ston pa'o //
T02D2147:233a-27: de'i don ni gshin rje ni phyin ci log gi gang zag la bya la /
T02D2147:233a-28: de la shes rab kyi snang ba ston par byed
T02D2147:233a-29: pas na gsung gi sgo nas snang ba bskyed pa'i
T02D2147:233a-30: glog go // gsus pa ni yangs pa yin la /
T02D2147:233a-31: sprul ni gti mug gi rang bzhin no //
T02D2147:233a-32: de 'joms par byed pa la za ba zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2147:233a-33: des ni gti mug can 'dul ba'o //
T02D2147:233a-34: de ltar dug gsum 'dul bar byed pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'i bstod pa'o //
T02D2147:233a-35: 'o na yon tan gyi khyad par ci zhe na /
T02D2147:233a-36: rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong
T02D2147:233a-37: yod pa rkang pa'i bus mor phyin ba zhes bya
T02D2147:233a-38: ba ni sku'i tshad bston pa ste /
T02D2147:233a-39: shin tu che zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2147:233a-40: dbang po dang nyi ma'i steng na bzhugs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2147:233a-41: dbang po ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi brgya byin dang /
T02D2147:233a-42: gzugs kyi khams kyi tshangs pa ste /
T02D2147:233b-0: kha sbus tu @233b bsnol ba'i tshangs pa'i phrag pa'i steng na zla ba nya gang ba lta bu'o //
T02D2147:233b-1: brgya byin gyi phrag pa'i steng na nyi ma ste /
T02D2147:233b-2: de gnyis kyi steng na bzhugs pa ni brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2147:233b-3: lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2147:233b-4: stobs phul du byung ba ste /
T02D2147:233b-5: lag pa brdabs pas 'jig rten gyi khams rlig par byed pa'i stobs mnga' ba'o //
T02D2147:233b-6: aa la la zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid la ngo mtshar ba'am /
T02D2147:233b-7: gdul bya la ngo mtshar ba'i sgra bsgrags pas skrag
T02D2147:233b-8: par byed pa zhes bya ba ni sa bla dang
T02D2147:233b-9: sa steng ngo // klu rnams rlog par byed ces pa ni sa 'og na gnas pa'o //
T02D2147:233b-10: de rnams gad mo drag po sgrogs pa'i bcom ldan
T02D2147:233b-11: 'das sku de dang ldan pa'i gad rgyangs chen po
T02D2147:233b-12: dgod des rlog par byed pa'o //
T02D2147:233b-13: 'o na phrin las ni mi mnga'i 'am zhe na /
T02D2147:233b-14: kun du 'khrugs par byed cing gshin rje'i gzugs can no //
T02D2147:233b-16: klu rnam 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya pa ni
T02D2147:233b-17: kun du 'khrugs par byed pa'i sku de las 'od
T02D2147:233b-18: zer kun du 'khrugs shing 'phro ba de las sprul
T02D2147:233b-19: pa dpag tu med pa phyag na rdo rje lta
T02D2147:233b-20: bu'i sprul pa 'phro bas na gshin rje'i gzugs can
T02D2147:233b-21: / sa 'og sa stengs sa bla gsum 'jigs par byed pas khams gsum 'jigs par byed pa'o //
T02D2147:233b-22: de yang gdul bya rnam pa gsum 'dul bar byed pas na /
T02D2147:233b-24: de'i phyir de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2147:233b-25: bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' phyag
T02D2147:233b-26: na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal nas spobs pa dang ldan
T02D2147:233b-27: pa'i phyir na phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'i don to
T02D2147:233b-28: // de la dgos pa ci yod ce na /
T02D2147:233b-29: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bstod nas gsung du gsol zhes smras pa'o //
T02D2147:233b-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
T02D2147:233b-31: gnas kyi bdud kyi khang pa de nyid tu ting
T02D2147:233b-33: de nas nam mkha' de nyid la gzhal yas khang
T02D2147:233b-34: dang zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi 'phrul
T02D2147:233b-35: pas bdud kyi khang pa de nyid gzhal yas khang
T02D2147:233b-36: du sprul te / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2147:233b-37: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhis rnam par mdzes //
T02D2147:233b-38: dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang //
T02D2147:233b-39: bdud rnams 'dul bar tva ra na'o //
T02D2147:233b-40: dharma dh'a tu nam mkha'i dkyil //
T02D2147:234a-1: ting nge 'dzin dang lhan pa'i drag po chen pos 'khor bsdus nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2147:234a-2: gzhal yas khang de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das phyan na rdo rje zhal gsum pa ste /
T02D2147:234a-3: 'dod pa dang gzugs dbang du sdud pa'i zhal g-yas
T02D2147:234a-4: g-yon dkar po dang dmar ser dbus mthing nag gti
T02D2147:234a-8: gtsigs pas drag po gsum 'dul bar byed pa /
T02D2147:234a-9: yang na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyis bdud kyi gtso
T02D2147:234a-10: bo'i cha lugs 'dzin pas bdud dbang du sdud pa'i
T02D2147:234a-11: rtags so // phyag drug ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /
T02D2147:234a-13: bar ma gnyis thal mo rdebs pa /
T02D2147:234a-14: tha ma gnyis sprul za ba /
T02D2147:234a-15: zhabs bzhis nyi zla dang tshangs pa dang /
T02D2147:234a-17: stag gi sha ma thabs dang /
T02D2147:234a-18: rigs bzhi'i klus sku la brgyan pa'o //
T02D2147:234a-19: gang gi bstod pa'i yon tan sku la rdzogs pa'i
T02D2147:234a-20: bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu lha mo mdzes
T02D2147:234a-21: ldan ma mthing nag gri gug dang thod pa bsnams
T02D2147:234a-22: shing / sku la 'khyud pa dang lhan cig tu gnas te /
T02D2147:234a-24: shar phyogs su dri za'i rigs kyi gnod sbyin 'dul bar byed de /
T02D2147:234a-25: dri za pho mo'i steng du khro bo bdud las
T02D2147:234a-26: rgyal bar byed pa zhes bya ba sku mdog dkar
T02D2147:234a-28: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /
T02D2147:234a-30: 'og ma gnyis pa sdigs mdzub bcas shing yum la 'khyud pa /
T02D2147:234a-31: lha mo 'od zer mdog dkar mo spu gri dang thod pa bsnams shing g-yon phyogs nas 'khril ba'o //
T02D2147:234a-32: lha phyogs su gshin rje'i rigs kyi gnod sbyin 'dul bar byed pa /
T02D2147:234a-33: gshin rje pho mo'i steng na khro bo gzi brjid 'bar ba zhes bya ba mdog ser po /
T02D2147:234a-34: phyag bzhi po rdo rje dang dbyug to 'dzin pa /
T02D2147:234a-35: 'og ma gnyis pa sdigs mdzub bcas shing yum la 'khyud pa /
T02D2147:234a-36: lha mo mdangs can ma sku mdogs ser mo zangs
T02D2147:234a-37: gri dang thod pa bsnams shing g-yon phyogs su 'khril
T02D2147:234a-38: ba'o // nub phyogs su chu lha'i rigs kyi gnod
T02D2147:234a-39: sbyin 'dul bar byed pa chu lha pho mo'i steng
T02D2147:234a-40: du khro bo rngam pa'i sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba
T02D2147:234a-41: ba'o // mdog dmar po / phyag bzhi pa rdo rje dang sprul zhags 'dzin pa //
T02D2147:234a-42: 'og ma gnyis pa sdigs mdzub bcangs shing yum la 'khyud pa /
T02D2147:234a-43: lha mo sgra dbyangs can sku mdog dmar mo sta
T02D2147:234b-0: re dang thod pa bsnams shing @234b g-yon phyogs nas

T02D2147:240b-22: / rab tu gnas pa byas la de la skyabs su 'gror bcug ste /
T02D2147:240b-23: mgul du btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
T02D2147:240b-24: chom rkun bzlog pa zhes bya ba ni lam du zhugs pa la sogs pa'i dus su'o //
T02D2147:240b-25: sas bya'o zhes bya ba ni dang po ma la
T02D2147:240b-26: sa nas gom pa 'dor ba'i tshe skyes pa'i g-yas
T02D2147:240b-27: / bud med kyi g-yon nas srin lag ma gtogs pa'i lag pas sa blangs te /
T02D2147:240b-28: sngags lan bdun btab nas byung ba'i tshe byams pa
T02D2147:240b-29: dang ldan pa'i bsam pas gdong du gtor na zhi
T02D2147:240b-30: bar 'gyur ro // dug la ni rtsva ku shas
T02D2147:240b-31: byab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dug rang la
T02D2147:240b-32: bar 'gyur ro // mi byab po / dug gis
T02D2147:240b-33: na ba la ni rtsva ku sha bsregs pa dang
T02D2147:240b-34: bar 'gyur ro // mi byab po / / yun
T02D2147:240b-35: ring po lon pa'i dmar po'i sa khru gang 'og
T02D2147:240b-36: nas 'jam po blud de lo brgyad pa'i chus sbyar
T02D2147:240b-37: nas sngags btab ste btang na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro
T02D2147:240b-39: bdag bsrung ba la yid kyis zhes bya ba ni
T02D2147:240b-40: dus thams cad du lhar mos pa'o //
T02D2147:240b-41: yang na chu la sngags btab pa ste bya'o //
T02D2147:240b-42: gzhan la ni gong gi skud pa so sos bya'o //
T02D2147:240b-43: las de thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni gcig gam /
T02D2147:240b-45: lan bcu bzhi'am nyi shu rtsa gcig gam brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2147:240b-46: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D2147:240b-47: 'khor rnams la de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D2147:241a-0: @241a * // bdud dpung dang bcas pa rjes su yi rangs te /
T02D2147:241a-1: yi rangs nas bstan pa la 'khod do //
T02D2147:241a-2: drag po gsum ni sa bla sa stengs /
T02D2147:241a-3: sa 'og gsum drag ni ma rungs pa'o //
T02D2147:241a-4: de la 'dul bar dus la bab par gzigs nas bstan pa la bkod pa'o //
T02D2147:241a-6: lung dang man ngag rtogs pas de don bsgrubs //
T02D2147:241a-7: 'bras bu bdud rtsi lta bu bdag gis 'thungs //
T02D2147:241a-8: sing ga la yi yul du de thob nas //
T02D2147:241a-9: phyi rabs rnams la phan phyir de don brtsams //
T02D2147:241a-10: mos shing 'jug pas phyag na rdo rje'i zhal mthong
T02D2147:241a-11: shog / drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud
T02D2147:241a-12: kyi 'grel ba bdud rtsi myu gu zhes bya ba
T02D2147:241a-13: / dngos grub brnyes pa'i dz'a ba ri pas sa
T02D2147:241a-14: ba ri pa la man ngag tu zhus pa rdzogs
T02D2147:241a-16: / pandi ta de nyid dang pandi ta de ba pu n+ya ma ti dang /
